title: Split-Level Addition
description: Client needed a way to access his cottage that was down a steep hill, and wanted some extra space. We framed an addition to bridge the height difference, providing the client with a safe and elegant staircase to access the main cottage below.

gallery.caption: Site overview of the steep cottage terrain.
Concrete foundation anchored directly to bedrock.
Floor joist framing for split-level transition.
Vertical wall framing for the cottage addition.
Exterior sheathing and weather barrier installation.

highlights: Foundation built atop bedrock due to challenging terrain and cost considerations, eliminating the need for extensive blasting operations
